actions.title: Run a 5-day interview burst
actions.description: Schedule at least 5 back-to-back interviews and capture raw quotes.

actions.title: Write the problem story
actions.description: Summarize the pain in one paragraph you can repeat to partners.

ceremony.title: Discovery Spark
ceremony.copy: Share the sharpest pain quote with your crew. Frame it, celebrate focus.

actions.title: Prototype feedback loop
actions.description: Ship a low-fidelity prototype and collect 3 rounds of reactions.

actions.title: Capture referral signals
actions.description: Ask each tester who else should see the demo.

ceremony.title: Solution Resonance
ceremony.copy: Record a short screen share telling the before/after story to your future self.

actions.title: Define activation checklist
actions.description: Document the 3 steps users must finish to get value.

actions.title: Weekly user sync
actions.description: Host a standing call with your 5 most active testers.

ceremony.title: Traction Toast
ceremony.copy: Toast your first 20 real users‚Äîsay their names, tell them why they matter.

actions.title: Run a retention study
actions.description: Interview 3 retained users and publish their before/after metrics.

actions.title: Lightweight incident review
actions.description: Review the last 2 reliability hiccups and capture fixes.

ceremony.title: PMF Signal Fire
ceremony.copy: Write a letter to your future Series A self describing the pull you feel today.

actions.title: Codify a growth loop
actions.description: Choose one loop (SEO, referrals, outbound) and document owners + inputs.

actions.title: Create hiring map
actions.description: List specialized roles you need in the next 2 quarters.

ceremony.title: Scale Systems
ceremony.copy: Invite the team to map the journey from first user to repeatable machine.

actions.title: Partner readiness brief
actions.description: Document partner types, value props, and onboarding steps.

actions.title: Expansion experiment portfolio
actions.description: List the top 3 markets or product lines with owners.

ceremony.title: Platform Threshold
ceremony.copy: Host a partner circle‚Äîinvite allies to share what they need from your platform.

actions.title: Run a cost-to-value review
actions.description: Audit each major surface for margin impact.

actions.title: Define the renewal bet
actions.description: Choose one reinvention or sunset track and set checkpoints.

ceremony.title: Renewal Summit
ceremony.copy: Pause to honor what got you here, then commit publicly to the next reinvention.
